titles.title: To counter the mass arbitrary detention of Turkic Muslims, including Uighurs, within the Xinjiang Uighur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.
UIGHUR Act of 2018
UIGHUR Act of 2018
Uighur Intervention and Global Humanitarian Unified Response Act of 2018
Uighur Intervention and Global Humanitarian Unified Response Act of 2018
UIGHUR Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
